ThingDef.label: molasses
ThingDef.description:
Molasses is a thick, dark syrup created as a byproduct of the sugar refining process, especially from sugarcane. It has a rich, bittersweet flavor and is often used in baking and cooking.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 50 molasses requires 10 sugar for a total value of 121, and sells for 8, giving a <color=#33CC33>69.75%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1250 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.32</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>160</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.25</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: salted caramel
ThingDef.description:
A decadent sauce made by heating sugar until it caramelizes and adding butter, with a hint of salt to balance the sweetness. The combination of rich, buttery caramel with a touch of salt creates a perfect harmony of flavors.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 salted caramel requires sugar, salt and butter for a total value of 215.52, and sells for 75, giving a <color=#33CC33>71.26%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 2000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.38</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>250</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>2.49</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
